At the significance level of <math alttext="alpha equals 0.01" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.01</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, a test of the following hypotheses was conducted.

All conditions for inference were met, and the resulting <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-value was 0.12. Which of the following is the correct decision for the test?
